q: large drawing of Michael Vick in his Eagles uniform superimposed over Cowboys Stadium. It is headlined: ''Super Bowl-- Dallas Dynasty 2011-- The Michael Vick Experience.'' And then in smaller type: Four-time Pro Bowl quarterback Michael Vick would like to personally invite you to the only upscale, A-list celebrity event of the 2011 Super Bowl. This will be the primary and preferred destination for inconic personalities from the NFL, MLB, Hollywood, the music industry and corporate America. Simply put the premier A-list high society event of the 2011 Super Bowl!! The last time Michael Vick hosted a party someone got shot in the leg. Mike Missanelli committed an unintentional violation while interviewing Eagles quarterback Michael Vick on his radio show yesterday. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli ''Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?''
